publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-293.3 Shona Robison: Closing the Opportunity Gapâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-293) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end "but recognises that none of this action will be enough to reduce poverty levels in Scotland, which will only be achieved once the Executive has power and control over tax and social security policy."
